script:
1). I'm going to the theater tonight.
I'm sorry.
It's too expensive.
Enjoy the show. 
2). Why isn't Tom coming to lunch with us?
He said he's already eaten. 
Tom went to lunch tomorrow.
Tom ate breakfast yesterday.
3). What time do you expect Ms. Perkins to return?
I'll wait in the lobby.
At about 3 o'clock. 
On the 14th.
